paramSchema.title: Report Path
paramSchema.name: reportPath
paramSchema.description: The system path to the lshttp .rtreport files. Default: /tmp/lshttpd.

paramSchema.title: Enble Partial Hostname
paramSchema.name: partialHostname
paramSchema.description: Use only first part of system hostname. Default: disabled. Example: Disabled: toaster.oven.com. Enabled: toaster.

paramSchema.title: Enable VHosts Level Request
paramSchema.name: enableVhostReq
paramSchema.description: Enable the logging of vhost level request metric.

paramSchema.title: Enable VHosts Level ExtApps
paramSchema.name: enableVhostExt
paramSchema.description: Enable the loggin of vhost level external app metric.

paramSchema.title: VHosts Filter
paramSchema.name: vhosts_filter
paramSchema.description: Include only specified vhosts in your graphs and exclude all others. If not set, all vhosts are shown. Format: vhost|alias.

paramSchema.title: Auto VHosts Limit
paramSchema.name: auto_vhosts_limit
paramSchema.description: Number of vhosts to show if vhost filtering is not enabled. Default: 20.
